General.Name: Element Nutritional Sciences Inc
General.Description: Element Nutritional Sciences Inc., a nutraceutical company, develops nutritional products in Canada and the United States. The company offers Rejuvenate, a proprietary formulation to assist in the rebuilding, restoration, and rejuvenation of natural loss of muscle mass due to aging or other medical conditions; JAKTRX performance supplement products; and PROMINO, an elite performance supplement for both professional and amateur athletes to accelerate muscle recovery, build strength, and accelerate recovery from injury. The company offers its products under the Rejuvenate and JAKTRX brand names. It also engages in retailing of its products through stores and online. The company was formerly known as Element Nutrition Inc. and changed its name to Element Nutritional Sciences Inc. in June 2021. Element Nutritional Sciences Inc. is based in Burlington, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Walkers Line, Burlington, ON, Canada, L7N 2G3
